attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These petitions are usually reponded to in the same manner, by stating that the Govt. is going to do exactly what the petition has asked not to do.

I want petitions to be debated in Parliament and not to be ignored or 'fobbed' off on this website. I want a real debate on the issues raised on this site and for the people petitions to actually mean something in our democracy.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
